<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/projects/{projectId}/databases/{databaseId}/backups/{backupId}/recoveries"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Restore a backup to a new database

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"databaseId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true},{"in":"path","name":"backupId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true},{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"projectId","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"targetDatabaseName":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the new database"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
